## Learning objectives

* Explain proper procedures for determining fouling and sensor drift offsets
* Properly clean fouled loggers
* Download and process logger data
* Correct logger data for fouling and sensor drift

## Resources

* [USGS TM1-D3](https://pubs.usgs.gov/tm/2006/tm1D3/pdf/TM1D3.pdf)

## Lesson plan

1. Slides on fouling and sensor drift corrections 
1. Retrieve, clean, and dry loggers
1. Download and process data
